title: 588: Neither, But Sorta
description: Our use of CarPlay, Android Auto, or other systems for navigation; creative AI problem-solving cases we’ve encountered; thoughts on Sonos’s struggles and future as a customer; and whether we use TikTok amid its potential US shutdown.
author: Dan Moren and Mikah Sargent

#588: Neither, But Sorta

January 15th, 2025 · 29 minutes

Our use of CarPlay, Android Auto, or other systems for navigation; creative AI problem-solving cases we’ve encountered; thoughts on Sonos’s struggles and future as a customer; and whether we use TikTok amid its potential US shutdown.

Guest Starring: Bryan Guffey and Allison Sheridan
